metadata.title: CVE-2023-42950 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 17.2, iOS 17.2 and iPadOS 17.2, tvOS 17.2, watchOS10.2, macOS Sonoma 14.2. Processing maliciously crafted web content maylead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
